sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM ( CHANNEL_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_URL, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_REGISTER, ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE) values(#channelId#, #itemId#, #itemUrl#, #itemTitle#, #itemDescription#, #itemRegister#, #itemPublishDate#)
sqlMap.delete: DELETE IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM WHERE CHANNEL_ID IN (SELECT CHANNEL_ID FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL WHERE CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId# )

DELETE IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID IN ( SELECT TOP $startRowIndex$ I.item_id FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL C INNER JOIN IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM I ON C.channel_id = I.channel_id WHERE C.owner_id = #ownerId# ORDER BY item_id ASC )

sqlMap.select: SELECT CHANNEL_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_URL, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_REGISTER, ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM WHERE ITEM_ID = #itemId#
SELECT TOP 1 CHANNEL_ID, ITEM_ID, ITEM_URL, ITEM_TITLE, ITEM_DESCRIPTION, ITEM_REGISTER, ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM WHERE ITEM_URL = #itemUrl# AND CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#

SELECT /* [ChannelItem_SqlMap.xml] selectAll */ * FROM ( SELECT A.* FROM ( /* START========================================= */ SELECT Row_number() OVER (
ORDER BY ITEM_TITLE ASC
ORDER BY ITEM_TITLE DESC
ORDER BY ITEM_REGISTER ASC
ORDER BY ITEM_REGISTER DESC
ORDER BY ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE ASC
ORDER BY ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE DESC
ORDER BY ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE DESC ) AS RNUM, A.CHANNEL_ID, A.ITEM_ID, A.ITEM_URL, A.ITEM_TITLE, A.ITEM_DESCRIPTION, A.ITEM_REGISTER, A.ITEM_PUBLISH_DATE FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM A INNER JOIN IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL B ON (A.CHANNEL_ID = B.CHANNEL_ID) WHERE B.OWNER_ID = #ownerId#
A.CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#
CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId#
AND A.ITEM_TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND A.ITEM_REGISTER LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
/* ===========================================END */
) A WHERE RNUM <= #endRowIndex# /* 종료 */ ) TBL WHERE RNUM > #startRowIndex# /* 시작 */

SELECT /* [ChannelItem_SqlMap.xml] countBySearchCondition */ COUNT(*) FROM IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL_ITEM A INNER JOIN IKEP4_RS_CHANNEL B ON (A.CHANNEL_ID = B.CHANNEL_ID) WHERE B.OWNER_ID = #ownerId#
A.CHANNEL_ID = #channelId#
CATEGORY_ID = #categoryId#
AND A.ITEM_TITLE LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
AND A.ITEM_REGISTER LIKE '%' + #searchWord# + '%'
